detail_desc: Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves,wide ties under the bust and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut coat in felted fabric with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Small shoulder bag with a concealed magnetic fastener and a flap with a decorative metal ring. Two-part inner compartment and a shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 5.5x14.5x21.5 cm.
Strapless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.

Shirt in soft cotton corduroy with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and a yoke. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem.
Short, straight-cut nightdress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in slightly stretchy jersey with raw edges.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck strappy tops in soft, organic cotton jersey, one ribbed.
Joggers in washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side and back pockets and elasticated hems. Loose fit.
Short dress in soft stretch jersey with shoulder pads and long sleeves.
Reversible bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets at the front, and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Hat in felted fabric with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains, one with a coin-shaped pendant and the other with plastic beads. Adjustable length 46-52 cm.
Top in ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket, lace details on the shoulders, a chest pocket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Push-up bra in lace and microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, fitted dress in a soft rib knit with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Cardigan in rib-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and a reflective detail.

Wedge-heel sandals with an ankle-height shaft, open section at the back, ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle and a strap over the foot. Heels and insoles covered in braided jute. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm, heel approx. 9 cm.

Small,compact shoulder bag with smart compartments and functions to give you space for everything from a small laptop to other essentials. Zip and roll-top closure at the top that can be folded down with the help of adjustable tabs and plastic fasteners. Detachable, zipped outer compartment and a wide, adjustable shoulder strap with a plastic fastener. One larger zipped inner compartment, and two smaller inner compartments. Padded back. Lined. Size 8x20x30 cm with the top rolled down and 8x30x30 cm at maximum capacity.
Wide, slightly shorter top in crinkled jersey. Wide, gathered shoulder straps with concealed elastication and frill trims, and a low-cut back with elastication at the hem and wide, horizontal ties.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.

Voluminous, straight-cut shirt in soft leather with a collar, covered buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long, wide sleeves with gathers and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Rounded, raw-edge hem.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Twill linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring wrapover hood, long sleeves with stripes down the sides, and a kangaroo pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, calf-length skirt in an airy cotton weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and elastication and a flounce around the neckline. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Trainers with platform soles, elastic gores in the sides and a narrow, padded edge at the back. Jersey linings and insoles. Platform 3.5 cm.

Set with a dress and leggings in cotton. Dress in woven fabric with buttons down the front, a yoke, long sleeves with concealed elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs, and a flared skirt. Patterned jersey leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Court shoes with pointed toes and open sides with narrow straps and an adjustable metal buckle. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Jumper in soft, cable-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons at the back of one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Elasticated top, 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Soft inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a seam at the waist, gentle draping to the hem and gathered details at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening, jetted back pockets, tapered legs with sewn-in creases and short slits at the hems.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in thermal fleece made partly from recycled polyester. Jacket with raglan sleeves, a jersey-lined hood with appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and trims at the cuffs and hem. Patterned trousers with covered elastication at the waist and trims at the hems.

Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with gathers at the top and a draped front. Long sleeves with pleats and flared cuffs, a seam at the waist with a drawstring and concealed zip in one side. Wide skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Short dress with cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake flap pockets at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes, crossover straps at the top and a zip at the heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top with a motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and chest pocket with an interactive detail. Ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-cut blouse in a cotton and silk crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and raglan puff sleeves with ties at the ends.
Sleeveless jersey top in a linen blend with a round neck and pleated lace frill at the shoulders. Gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with notch lapels, covered buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Two-button jacket in a woven cotton blend with a decorative buttonhole on one lapel, chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless, turtleneck body in stretch, ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on one sleeve and a jersey-lined drawstring hood. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge hem.
Double-breasted jacket in a checked weave with slightly wider lapels, a tapered waist with pleats front and back, and flap front pockets. Lined.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a lined, detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud, and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, kangaroo pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif in a slightly longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
